flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=14>>14 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 14*20=<<14*20=280>>280 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*280=<<4*280=1120>>1120 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 280*2=<<280*2=560>>560 square feet
So he has 1120+560=<<1120+560=1680>>1680 square feet of rooms
#### 1680

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
